name: cz-mapbox-changelog
description: A commitizen plugin and git log parsing tool to create readable changelogs

scripts.new-change:
OLD=$(cat last-version) && NEW=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && echo '# '$NEW'
' >> CHANGELOG.md && git log $OLD..$NEW | ./bin/parse-git-log --filter-out=UNCATEGORIZED >> CHANGELOG.md && echo $NEW > last-version
